# Artistic Studies
## Overview
**Artistic Studies**

You have spent considerable effort learning the rules of art and social interaction, thus overcoming your lack of natural presence.

**Benefit:** You may add your Intelligence modifier (rather than your Charisma modifier) to [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], and [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks.

**Source:** Ultimate Options: New Arcane Discoveries (Super Genius Games), pg. 2
